00044 /** 
00045  *  @defgroup ro_motor_pwm  Motor PWM
00046  *  @code #include <motor_pwm.h> @endcode
00047  * 
00048  *  @brief Routines for controlling PWM-Signals towards the Motors
00049  *
00050  * 
00051  * This Routines are for setting the PWMs base frequency and for
00052  * scaling the modulated duty cycle. 
00053  *   
00054  *  @note Based on Atmel Datasheet for Atmega128, Nov. 2006
00055  *  @author Rainer Ostendorf
00056  */
00057 
00058 /**@{*/
00059 
00060 
00061 #ifndef MOTOR_PWM_H_
00062 #define MOTOR_PWM_H_
00063 
00064 
00065 /* Number of steps the PWM duty-cycle is 
00066  * divided to. Typically 255
00067  */
00068 #define PWM_RESOLUTION 255
00069 
00070 /* SECURITY FEATURE:
00071  * cut-off frequency to protect the h-bridges from
00072  * beeing stressed to much by high pwm-frequencies.
00073  * any frequency above this will be mapped to PWM_SECURITY_MAX_FREQ.
00074  * Typically about 10000 to 15000 Hz.
00075 */
00076 #define PWM_SECURITY_MAX_FREQ 10000
00077 
00078 /* SECURITY FEATURE:
00079  * minimal active time of the PWM signal.
00080  * To avoid the active-times of the PWM-signal
00081  * to get to short, as that increases the power dissipation
00082  * to a critical level (FETs running in analogue mode) */
00083 #define PWM_SECURITY_MIN_DUTY (PWM_RESOLUTION / 200)
00084 
00085 /** Internal variables for motor-dutycycles. */
00086 /** Please dont touch these values, as they are used by the
00087  * set_pwm_frequency-method to adjust the theshold (OCRx)
00088  * values, after a update to the TOP-value (ICP) of the counter was performed 
00089  */ 
00090 uint8_t __motor1_duty;
00091 uint8_t __motor2_duty;
00092 
00093 /** Initialize the PWM-Signal generation for the both motors */
00094 void init_motor_pwm( void );
00095 
00096 /** Set the base frequency for the PWM signal 
00097  * @param hz frequency in Hertz
00098  */
00099 void set_motor_pwm_freq(uint16_t hz);
00100 
00101 /** set enable-signal of motor 1 to high */
00102 inline void enable_motor1( void );
00103 
00104 /** set enable-signal of motor 2 to high */
00105 inline void enable_motor2( void );
00106 
00107 /** set enable-signal of motor 1 to low */
00108 inline void disable_motor1( void );
00109 
00110 /** set enable-signal of motor 2 to low */
00111 inline void disable_motor2( void );
00112 
00113 
00114 /** Set the duty-cycle of motor 1 
00115  * @param speed Percentage of duty (high) level during clock cycle
00116  *                              the maximum speed is PWM_RESOLUTION (typlicalle 255),
00117  *                              the minimum speed is 0.
00118  * @param dir Direction of the motor. Either 0(forward) or 1(backward)
00119  */
00120 inline void set_motor1( uint8_t speed, uint8_t dir );
00121 
00122 /** Set the duty-cycle of motor 2 
00123  * @param speed Percentage of duty (high) level during clock cycle
00124  *                              the maximum speed is PWM_RESOLUTION (typlicalle 255),
00125  *                              the minimum speed is 0.
00126  * @param dir Direction of the motor. Either 0 (forward) or 1(backward) 
00127  */
00128 inline void set_motor2( uint8_t speed,  uint8_t dir );
00129 
00130 
00131 #endif /*MOTOR_PWM_H_*/
00132 
00133 /**@}*/
